# Introduction {#sec-intro}

```{r}
#| echo: false

# Read in the data
Project11 <- read.csv("~/Desktop/STATS4052/DAS-Group-5/DAProject11.csv")

# Add a new column called IsObese based on the value of BMI group
Project11 <- Project11 |>
  dplyr::mutate(IsObese = ifelse(BMIgroup == "Obese", "Obesity", "Not Obesity"))
```

# Exploratory Analysis {#sec-exp}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: fig-barplot
#| message: false
#| fig-cap: "Barplot of year by Obesity"
#| fig-width: 4
#| fig-height: 3
#| fig-align: center


# To show original counts
Project11 |>
  tabyl(IsObese,Year) |>
  adorn_percentages() |>
  adorn_pct_formatting() |>
  adorn_ns()

ggplot(data = Project11, aes(x = Year, group = IsObese))+
  geom_bar(aes(y = after_stat(prop), fill = IsObese), stat = "count", position = "dodge") +
  labs(y = "Proportion", fill = "IsObese")

```
